channel.title: Free Donator Status on servers (or extra money)
channel.description:
This is only for Apple and Android Users!
Welcome, to a special guide on how to receive free donator status (Well, for the most part). Before we continue, I would like to point out you will still be paying the required amount, but the process in which the money is acquired is absolutely free.
The way in which we will be going to receive this free money is from [url=https://featurepoints.com]Feature Points[/url]
I have been using this for the past month, and have acquired around 800$ from only doing about 10 minutes of work a day. What this 10 minutes process includes is:
Downloading [Free] Apps. Using them for around 5 seconds Earning points from doing this Redeeming earned points for Paypal cash
Please note, that there are other rewards available, but the Paypal one is the only relevant reward at this time.
When you register for [url=https://featurepoints.com]Feature Points[/url] You will end up at a similar page like this: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/14slg1.jpg[/img]
As seen in the image above, on the left hand side it shows what you will be downloading (this is done via the app store/google play store not the actual site, just incase you were wondering) Once that app has been downloaded and you have opened it at least once, go back to feature points and you will have received the points as seen on the right hand side.
Also seen in the image, it will cost 3k points in order to receive 5$. This may seem like a lot ... but it's not really. If you actually get decently involved you can be making around 100$ a day without much effort (Around 5 - 10 minutes) This is what I do to make all the money I have donated towards the server. (Upwards of 100$)
The links provided in this post are meant for phone use only - If they are not used on a phone it will redirect to the website, but will tell you to try on your phone.
This is the link that has been provided throughout the Post: http://www.featurepoints.com
It's a really good website, this is what I use along with another app called "App redeem" and make around 200$ a day with no work at all, I don't even go on the website anymore and make 200$ a day. (Doesn't seem like a shit load, but money for nothing is .... money for nothing)

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Hi, I have removed your referral links as we have never allowed our users to make money/gain anything off of their links. Also, if you’re confused about my basis for this action, feel free to take a look at rule 1 and rule 6 of the global rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Donator Status on servers (or extra money)
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“FPNewbie, post:22, topic:522915”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=641409.msg4321166#msg4321166 date=1372228341]
It is an unlisted rule. Your thread will be taken care of soon enough, enjoy your free reign while it lasts
[/quote]

an unlisted rule? this community is amazing…[/quote]

Feel free to leave then. You’ve made a horrible first impression and I don’t think anyone would care if you were to never visit here again. Yes, it’s basically what we consider to be an unlisted rule (we frown upon these point system scams) and a listed rule if it’s referral based (which i believe justin has just shown). Either way, you’re in breach. Also, we get these on a regular basis. We’re coming down heavy because of your attitude towards the other members.

[quote=“FPNewbie, post:25, topic:522915”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=641409.msg4321172#msg4321172 date=1372228514]

It is an unlisted rule. Your thread will be taken care of soon enough, enjoy your free reign while it lasts

an unlisted rule? this community is amazing…

this community doesn’t typically enjoy users who join just to post his referral link
[/quote]

ctfu I have another account

I’m not sure what you’re getting at? I’m done with you, bye. All I needed was to post this. And I also bet most, if not all of you are going to try this.[/quote]

Another account? Excellent. This shall give you a nice little ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Donator Status on servers (or extra money)
item.dc:creator: @FPNewbie FPNewbie
item.description:
@FPNewbie wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:18, topic:522915”][quote author=FPNewbie link=topic=641409.msg4321160#msg4321160 date=1372228014]
No, sorry try again. I am not selling any products, nor am I offering rewards (real-word/online items), for YOUR money (donations). I am simply supplying information, and a link.
[/quote]

a referral link[/quote]

Ctrl + F = “refer”. nothing comes up in the rules, not ONE single word as “refer”, “referral”, or anything about that whatsoever. you guys think you can get around at me with the rules but you cannot. I’ve proven all of you wrong. If you don’t like the thread and think it’s annoying, don’t click on it, don’t reply, and simply move on without knowing facts and knowing the rules.

item.title: Free Donator Status on servers (or extra money)
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“FPNewbie, post:14, topic:522915”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=641409.msg4321149#msg4321149 date=1372227389]
This Isn’t Allowed, Please Take It Down.
[/quote]

which one exactly?

Global forum rules:

[quote]Rules:
Rule 1:
Moderators lock topics/remove posts and topics/hand infractions to users at their own discretion as required to foster a positive community. Any disagreement with a staff member’s decision is to be resolved through the use of the PM system. Any public disputes are unacceptable and punishable. A moderators decision is final, if you have a problem with it, pm an administrator. Trying to resolve it through a thread will result in a heavier punishment.

Rule 2:
Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them).

Rule 3:
Posts should be knowledgeable, try to put some effort into them, it’ll save hassle and stop you from looking like an idiot.

Rule 4:
We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for MoparScape, Moparisthebest and Mopar Game Dev.

Rule 5:
Advertising is to be kept strictly to the designated boards (RS2 | RS Classic), or the Server Status Page (RS2 only).

Rule 6:
We don’t post misleading links, do not try to trick people into visiting things they don’t want to.

Rule 7:
bad picsographic content is not allowed under any circumstances. This includes images, links, or deep-rooted discussions regarding watching, sharing, creating, or otherwise being involved with bad picsographic media. bad picsography may be referenced and discussed up to the point where it does not violate the above statement.

Explicit content or otherwise questionable content may be allowed, but we expect users to use the ‘NSFW’ rule when posting (Not Safe For Work). Users are expected to use this tag in the title to inform other users the topic may contain explicit content. Please use your discretion when posting such content.

Rule 8:
We do not sell anything on this site, period. This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that. Selling via signature is not an exception. Furthermore, all requests of price or value for any property related to the game RuneScape is disallowed on these boards. This rule exists to prevent scamming, dishonest trading, and legal liability regarding the exchange of Jagex property. We do not encourage people to buy or sell anything related to RuneScape, Jagex, or any of their games.

Rule 9:
Do not post or upload any copyrighted material.

Rule 10:
We never advertise via the PM system whether the site is approved or not. If your site is approved than you must advertise through appropriate means.

Rule 11:
We respect each other and other communities. We do not flame. There is to be no fighting on the forums.

All of the rules stated in this post apply to Moparscape and Moparisthebest, they apply to all topics and all messages, failure to comply to these rules with result in punishment handed out at the staff members’ digression.[/quote]

Rules of this board:

[quote]Global forum rules apply
Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other
This board is not meant for questions, please post those here
No bad picsography, please
No warez
No extremely grotesque images
No requesting ‘coders’, hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.
No more “leaving”, “sympathy”, or “coming back” topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))[/quote][/quote]This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Donator Status on servers (or extra money)
item.dc:creator: @FPNewbie FPNewbie
item.description:
@FPNewbie wrote:

Host Gushers:

This Isn’t Allowed, Please Take It Down.

which one exactly?

Global forum rules:

Rules: Rule 1: Moderators lock topics/remove posts and topics/hand infractions to users at their own discretion as required to foster a positive community. Any disagreement with a staff member's decision is to be resolved through the use of the PM system. Any public disputes are unacceptable and punishable. A moderators decision is final, if you have a problem with it, pm an administrator. Trying to resolve it through a thread will result in a heavier punishment.

Rule 2:
Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them).

Rule 3:
Posts should be knowledgeable, try to put some effort into them, it’ll save hassle and stop you from looking like an idiot.

Rule 4:
We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for MoparScape, Moparisthebest and Mopar Game Dev.

Rule 5:
Advertising is to be kept strictly to the designated boards (RS2 | RS Classic), or the Server Status Page (RS2 only).

Rule 6:
We don’t post misleading links, do not try to trick people into visiting things they don’t want to.

Rule 7:
bad picsographic content is not allowed under any circumstances. This includes images, links, or deep-rooted discussions regarding watching, sharing, creating, or otherwise being involved with bad picsographic media. bad picsography may be referenced and discussed up to the point where it does not violate the above statement.

Explicit content or otherwise questionable content may be allowed, but we expect users to use the ‘NSFW’ rule when posting (Not Safe For Work). Users are expected to use this tag in the title to inform other users the topic may contain explicit content. Please use your discretion when posting such content.

Rule 8:
We do not sell anything on this site, period. This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that. Selling via signature is not an exception. Furthermore, all requests of price or value for any property related to the game RuneScape is disallowed on these boards. This rule exists to prevent scamming, dishonest trading, and legal liability regarding the exchange of Jagex property. We do not encourage people to buy or sell anything related to RuneScape, Jagex, or any of their games.

Rule 9:
Do not post or upload any copyrighted material.

Rule 10:
We never advertise via the PM system whether the site is approved or not. If your site is approved than you must advertise through appropriate means.

Rule 11:
We respect each other and other communities. We do not flame. There is to be no fighting on the forums.

All of the rules stated in this post apply to Moparscape and Moparisthebest, they apply to all topics and all messages, failure to comply to these rules with result in punishment handed out at the staff members’ digression.

Rules of this board:

Global forum rules apply Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other This board is not meant for questions, please post those here No bad picsography, please No warez No extremely grotesque images No requesting 'coders', hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions. No more "leaving", "sympathy", or "coming back" topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))

Read full topic
